v2.1.0
======

* Refresh packaging. Require Python 3.6.

v2.0.0
======

Switch to `pkgutil namespace technique
<https://packaging.python.org/guides/packaging-namespace-packages/#pkgutil-style-namespace-packages>`_
for the ``jaraco`` namespace.

======

* Refresh package.
* Minor bug fixes.

1.0

* Initial release
